statements: SELECT * FROM languages;
SELECT language_name, last_update FROM languages;
SELECT language_id, language_name FROM languages WHERE language_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM languages ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT language_name FROM languages WHERE language_name LIKE '%en%';
SELECT * FROM languages ORDER BY language_name DESC, language_id ASC;
SELECT language_name, last_update FROM languages WHERE language_id = 3;
SELECT language_name FROM languages WHERE language_name LIKE 'S%' AND last_update > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM languages WHERE last_update BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT language_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM languages GROUP BY language_name HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM LanguageSupport;
SELECT language_name, language_code FROM LanguageSupport ORDER BY language_code DESC;
SELECT key, value FROM Translations WHERE language_code = 'en' ORDER BY key ASC;
SELECT key, value FROM Translations WHERE key LIKE '%title%' AND value ILIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM LanguageSupport WHERE language_name = 'Spanish';
SELECT * FROM LanguageSupport;
SELECT language_name, language_code FROM LanguageSupport ORDER BY language_name DESC;
SELECT key, value, LanguageSupport.language_name FROM Translations INNER JOIN LanguageSupport ON Translations.language_code = LanguageSupport.language_code;
SELECT * FROM Translations WHERE key LIKE 'user%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_translations FROM Translations;
SELECT * FROM languages
SELECT language_id, language_name FROM languages ORDER BY language_name DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, preferred_language_id FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT product_id, product_name, description FROM products WHERE language_id = 2
SELECT product_name FROM products WHERE product_id = 5
SELECT * FROM languages WHERE language_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, language_name FROM customers INNER JOIN languages ON customers.preferred_language_id = languages.language_id;
SELECT product_name, description FROM products WHERE product_id > 5 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, description FROM products WHERE language_id IN (SELECT language_id FROM languages WHERE language_name LIKE 'Eng%');
SELECT customer_name, language_name FROM customers LEFT JOIN languages ON customers.preferred_language_id = languages.language_id ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM language;
SELECT language_name FROM language ORDER BY language_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, country_name FROM user_profile JOIN country ON user_profile.country_id = country.country_id;

SELECT user_name, language_name, proficiency_level FROM user_profile JOIN user_language ON user_profile.user_id = user_language.user_id JOIN language ON user_language.language_id = language.language_id;
SELECT language_name, COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM language LEFT JOIN user_language ON language.language_id = user_language.language_id GROUP BY language_name;
SELECT * FROM language WHERE language_id = 1;

SELECT user_name, country_name, language_name FROM user_profile up JOIN country c ON up.country_id = c.country_id JOIN user_language ul ON up.user_id = ul.user_id JOIN language l ON ul.language_id = l.language_id WHERE proficiency_level = 'Advanced';
SELECT user_name, language_name FROM user_profile up JOIN user_language ul ON up.user_id = ul.user_id JOIN language l ON ul.language_id = l.language_id WHERE country_id = 2 ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, proficiency_level FROM user_profile up JOIN user_language ul ON up.user_id = ul.user_id WHERE language_id = 3 AND country_id = 1 ORDER BY proficiency_level DESC;

SELECT user_name, language_name, proficiency_level FROM user_profile up JOIN user_language ul ON up.user_id = ul.user_id JOIN language l ON ul.language_id = l.language_id WHERE proficiency_level IN ('Intermediate', 'Advanced') ORDER BY user_name ASC, language_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM languages;
SELECT language_name FROM languages ORDER BY language_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE preferred_language_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, description FROM products WHERE language_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT source_text, target_text FROM translations WHERE source_language_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND target_language_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM languages;
SELECT language_name, language_id FROM languages ORDER BY language_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE preferred_language_id IS NULL;
SELECT product_id, product_name, description FROM products WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM orders);
SELECT user_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
